segments.text: Excuse me , is there a table for 8 right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... I am sorry the tables you want are booked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , since there are some small square tables , could we put two tables together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , sir . Let me help you .
segments.speaker: S2
